channel.title: Ai on Noonker
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on Noonker

item.title: I Respect Our Shared Humanity
item.description: Intro I used to be a person who cared greatly about ensuring that my prose were correct, and that I spelled everything correctly. I'm actually going to avoid that here and I'm not even going to bother with a spell checker. For most casual communication I now like to focus on being fast and funny at the expense of the red squiggly lines or appeasing the specter of my english teacher.
